summary: This module contains a comprehensive suite of unit tests that validate the geometric computations performed by the uxarray library, including handling of latitude/longitude bounds, pole inclusion tests, antimeridian crossing, extreme great-circle arc calculations, and stereographic projections across various grid configurations.
business_intent: To guarantee the accuracy and robustness of geospatial grid geometry operations used in scientific modeling and analysis, thereby preventing errors in downstream climate and ocean data processing pipelines.
